p:
allow witnesses 12 miles each S.C. Hyde
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss. Territory of Washington, Plaintiff vs. William C. Swartz defendant} In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, hold- ing terms at Cheney, Spo- kane County, in said Territory
To the Sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting: In the name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon James K. Ralph, Elizabeth J Ralph. C.R. Wells, A.B. Gilson, Margaret Miles, J. Miles Benny Benningson, Mary Benningson Alexander Redding Samuel Heller to be and appear before the Hon. George Turner at chambers in Spokane COunty Fall W.T. at the court house, in Cheney in said County, on the 14th day of August A.D. 1885 at 10 o'clock A.M. to there give evi- dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said plaintiff.
Witness the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 12th day of Aug A.D. 1885 D.A. Clement Clerk By Deputy
